Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
Playlist
public class Playlist extends Object
This class represents a Playlist, which contains a list of songs and provides methods to add, remove, and manipulate songs.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Bryan Ho

    • getNumSongs

      public int getNumSongs()
      Getter for how many songs are in a playlist
      Returns:
      --> gives the number of songs in a playlist

    • getSong

      public Song getSong(int index)
      Getter for a song in a playlist given an index
      Parameters:
      index - --> the index of where the song is in a playlist
      Returns:
      --> gives the Song object at "index"

    • getSongs

      public Song[] getSongs()
      Getter for Songs
      Returns:
      --> gives a Song array

    • addSong

      public boolean addSong(Song song)
      Method to add a song at the end of the playlist when passing a Song object
      Parameters:
      song - --> Song object
      Returns:
      --> calls the other addSong() which gives a T/F statement

    • addSong

      public boolean addSong(int index, Song song)
      Method addSongs which adds a given song to whatever index
      Parameters:
      index - --> where the song goes
      song - --> Song object
      Returns:
      --> gives T/F statement if the song was successfully added

    • addSongs

      public int addSongs(Playlist playlist)
      Method to add all songs from another playlist
      Parameters:
      playlist - --> a Playlist object containing songs to add
      Returns:
      --> number of songs successfully added

    • addSongs

      public int addSongs(String filename)
      Reads songs from a file and adds them to the playlist
      Parameters:
      filename - --> name of the file containing song data
      Returns:
      --> number of songs successfully added

    • removeSong

      public Song removeSong()
      Removes the last song from the playlist
      Returns:
      --> the removed Song object, or null if empty

    • removeSong

      public Song removeSong(int index)
      Removes a song from a specific index in the playlist
      Parameters:
      index - --> index of the song to remove
      Returns:
      --> the removed Song object, or null if index is out of range

    • saveSongs

      public void saveSongs(String filename)
      Saves the current playlist to a file
      Parameters:
      filename - --> name of the file to save the playlist in

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the playlist into a formatted string
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      --> a string representation of the playlist

    • getTotalTime

      public int[] getTotalTime()
      Calculates the total time duration of all songs in the playlist
      Returns:
      --> an array where [0] = seconds, [1] = minutes, [2] = hours

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
